synopsis.text: Effect—to combat the enigmatic 'Ostinato Musicians' who support μ and view the club as traitors. Caught in a world where reality intertwines with the virtual, the Go-Home Club embarks on a daring quest for the truth, determined to escape the clutches of Mobius and return to their real lives. As they navigate through this digital labyrinth, they uncover the dark secrets behind the alluring utopia created by μ, and the true intentions of the virtual idol who claims to be their savior. In this thrilling psychological adventure, the members of the Go-Home Club must confront their deepest emotions and harness the power of the Catharsis Effect to shatter the illusions of Mobius and find their way back home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
